about_the_game:
In the future city, a supernatural energy body named Yama is born out of an unknown reason and only has a sense of killing.
Yama splits rapidly, contaminating all living things, including artificial machinery.
After going through a period of chaos like purgatory and fighting at the expense of half the world's population, mankind finally mastered the method of killing Yama and gradually gained the upper hand.
Dying ecology, waiting to be rebuilt. And under the slightly smooth situation, hidden turbulent.
How will the world change because you're in it?
-- Game Features --
More than 10h plot - enjoy the complete love experience
With the help of L2D technology, he is more real under the palm
Sweet Rendezvous -- High free exploration mode, explore his other side
Suspense micro fear - thrilling adventure waiting for you to experience
